    #include<iostream>
    #define ll long long int
    using namespace std;
    ll gcd(ll a, ll b)
    {
    	if (b == 0)
    		return a;
    	return gcd(b, a%b);
    }
     
    ll check(ll a, ll b)
    {
    	if (b == 1)
    	{
    		cout << "Yes" << endl;
    		return 0;
    	}
    	ll d=gcd(a,b);
    	if (d== 1)
    	{
    		cout << "No" << endl;
    		return 0;
    	}
    	return check(a, b/d);
    }
    int main()
    {
    	int t;
    	cin >> t;
    	while (t--)
    	{
    		ll a, b;
    		cin >> a >> b;
    		check(a,b);
    	}
    }
